attributes.action: Any British Citizen should be able to countersign passport application
attributes.additional_details: Why should counter signatories for passports be restricted to selected British citizens.  Do we really believe that going to University makes someone more trustworthy?  Is a banker more trustworthy than a bus driver? A solicitor more trustworthy than a secretary? A doctor more trustworthy than a dinner lady?  Let's get rid of this out of date discrimination
